experience-Work Experience.title: Intro
details: (May - July 2024)

experience-Work Experience.title: Fuzzing to Test JIT Compiler | Research Internship
details: Guide: Prof. Andreas Zeller | CISPA, Germany
• Learned multiple sophisticated fuzzing techniques aimed at automating the discovery of bugs in softwares
• Utilized modern, real-world fuzzers to generate automated test cases and examined their implementation
• Worked on developing a fuzzer to automate testing of the JIT compiler used in PyPy for Python programs
• Implemented the Fuzzer using methodologies detailed in the academic paper "CREAL: Compiler-assisted
Representation Learning for Dynamic Analysis" authored by Shao-Hua Li

experience-Work Experience.title: Penetration Testing | Corporate Internship
details: Del Capital | Remote
• Performed an extensive Penetration Test on the internal infrastructure of Del Capital on 11 company roles
• Reported security vulnerabilities and risks like race condition, use of outdated webservers with known CVE

experience-Work Experience.title: Intern Analyst | Corporate Internship
details: Wells Fargo International Solutions | Hyderabad, India
• Automated migration of reporting workflows from SAP BusinessObjects to Power BI
• Extended the open-source SQL parser sqlglot to support Teradata stored procedure parsing for lineage extraction
• Engineered a custom solution to programmatically derive data lineage from SQL query structures
• Generated regulator-ready data lineage visualizations and metadata for internal databases

positions-Positions of Responsibilities.title: Core Team Member | Cyber Security Community, IIT Bombay
details: Part of a team of 8 students catering to the Cyber Security related interests of 5000+ students of the Institute
• Conducted 3 Cyber Security courses in Learners’ Space summer programme, by UGAC, IITBombay
• Successfully organised an Introductory CTF Session and a Basics of Hacking Session for 500+ students
• Participated in CTF competitions with team IITBreachers, consistently ranking in India’s top 10 on CTFtime
• Successfully organised a beginner level CTF within the institute and implemented challenges for the same
• Designed and implemented multiple CTF challenges for an upcoming international CTF competition
(January - April 2024)

positions-Positions of Responsibilities.title: Teaching Assistant | Web Application Security Course
details: Guide: Prof. Kameswari Chebrolu
• Created Web Application Security Labs as course content using Django framework based on vulnerabilities in
Web Sockets, misconfigurations in CSRF tokens, and protection against SQLI attacks
• Conducted rigorous security tests on labs based on SQLI, SSRF, Arbitrary File Upload, Path Traversal,
Command Injection and CORS misconfiguration to identify potential unintended vulnerabilities

projects-Projects.title: Python Web Crawler | Course Project
details: Guide: Prof. Kameswari Chebrolu
• Designed and developed a Python web crawler utilizing libraries like Requests and BeautifulSoup
• Added a depth-limiting functionality which allows users to crawl websites to a specified depth
• Implemented an additional feature that enables users to display the file type of the crawled links
• Introduced an optional flag, which when specified, only crawls links without the status code of 4xx

projects-Projects.title: AI-Powered Quiz Generation Platform | Course Project
details: Guide: Prof. Ramkumar Rajendran
• Built an AI-Powered Quiz Generation Platform that uses video transcripts to generate personalised
quizzes tailored to students’ grade of study and video content.
• Designed and developed full-stack architecture using Node.js + Express and React with REST APIs and a
responsive user interface.
• Integrated Google Gemini AI for automated quiz question generation from video transcripts and implemented
hierarchical content organization (supermodules → videos → quiz sets).
• Engineered student dashboard and admin panel enabling quiz taking, results tracking, performance monitor-
ing at concept level, and quiz management with visibility controls.
• Developed Python scripts for transcript processing, concept extraction, and AI-driven question generation, and
seeded structured educational data into PostgreSQL database.

projects-Projects.title: Shared Rating System | Course Project
details: Guide: Prof. S Sudarshan
• Developed a full-stack web application enabling users to rate, review, and discuss content (movies, books, games)
• Built a responsive frontend using React (TypeScript) with Tailwind CSS and SPA architecture
• Implemented a Node.js (Express.js) backend with PostgreSQL for persistent storage and RESTful APIs
• Designed and normalized database schema to support content, ratings, discussions, messaging, and social graphs
• Engineered a C++ based recommendation engine using cosine similarity for collaborative filtering; integrated
with backend via child process
• Implemented secure authentication (bcrypt, session cookies), input validation, and session management
• Created features like threaded discussions with recursive SQL, direct messaging with polling, and privacy-
controlled friend lists

achievements-Cyber Security Achievements: • Successfully reported a misconfiugration in IIT Bombay Mars Server that allowed escalating privileges to root
• Successfully reported an IDOR vulnerability in a course VM allowing admin access to a database of students
• Secured 8th position in Nullcon CTF 2023 as team IITBreachers out of more than 500+ teams
• Attained 4th position in TrustLab CTF 2023 conducted by IIT Bombay in freshman year
• Secured 64th position in Sekai CTF 2023 as team IITBreachers out of more than 2000+ teams
• Among top 5 percent in TryHackMe, an industry recognized platform for learning cyber security
• Solved 100+ Portswigger Labs involving various Web Application Security concepts including OWASP top 10
• Solved 20+ boxes in HackTheBox and TryHackMe demonstrating proficiency in penetration testing concepts
extracurricular-Extracurriculars: • Writing Blogs in Medium related to various Cyber Security topics with overall 7500+ views
• Participant in semi contact State Level Kickboxing Championship, West Bengal
• Awarded green belt in Wado Kai Karate, a form of martial art, one of the four variants of Karate
• Completed a year long training program in athletics under National Sports Organization
• Participated in Gyrations, the Inter-Hostel Dance Competition at IIT Bombay
• Built an Arduino based RC car in XLR8, an introductory Electronics event in IIT Bombay
• Participated in inter-school Chess Competition at Saint Paul’s School, Jalpaiguri
